EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: 0.0, 0.0)  
  Acts as the core processing facility for smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5)  
  Stores the iron plates produced by the furnace.

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position: -16.0, -51.0)  
  Performs automated iron ore extraction; previously suffered from fuel shortages and was successfully refueled.
- Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -49.5)  
  Conveys extracted ore from the mining drill.
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -49.5)  
  Configured with a pickup at (-15.5, -49.5) and a drop position at (-13.5, -49.5); currently in a waiting state due to sink placement issues.
- Output Chest (position: -12.5, -48.5)  
  Placed via a nearest-buildable-area approach as the designated sink for items from the burner inserter.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Placement and Chest Positioning Errors  
  – Ensure target tiles are completely free before placing entities. When positioning output chests, adjust spacing, direction, or reference positions to avoid collisions with existing chests or terrain constraints.

• Belt Connection and Reversed Connection Errors  
  – Verify that connection paths between transport belts and inserters are clear and correctly aligned. Remove any interfering entities occupying critical connection points prior to attempting both standard and reversed connections.

• Inventory and Sub-ingredient Availability  
  – Confirm that all required items for placement and crafting are present. Double-check that composite items (for example, crafting an iron chest) have all necessary sub-ingredients available.

• Fuel Management  
  – Monitor and maintain sufficient fuel levels for automated entities such as mining drills and inserters to prevent interruptions in operation.

• Output Sink Blockage  
  – Place sink entities (output chests) within valid buildable areas adjacent to inserter drop positions. Resolve issues where the inserter reports blockages by ensuring the sink area is unobstructed and adequately spaced.
